thread.title: 200 attend Issue 3 forum in Yellow Springs
thread.title_full: 200 attend Issue 3 forum in Yellow Springs - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: 200 attend Issue 3 forum in Yellow Springs
text: Nearly 200 people are attending an Issue 3 forum on the marijuana amendment to the state Constitution. The forum is taking place at Antioch University Midwest. So far, most of those speaking at the forum have voiced support for the issue. Others have raised concerns about possible increased access for those younger than 21 and about an industry monopoly they say would be created by the amendment. One proponent discussed his concerns about a monopoly, when the crowd chanted " pass the mic, pass the mic " so his turn speaking would end. WHIOâ€™s Lauren Clark is covering the event and will have a full report tonight at 11.
